title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.12 - Ventilation hoods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.12 - Ventilation hoods

State Regulations

Ventilation hoods and devices, where installed, shall be
designed to prevent grease or condensation from collecting on walls and
ceilings, and from dripping into food or onto food-contact surfaces. Filters or
other grease-extracting equipment shall be readily removable for cleaning and
replacement, if not designed to be cleaned in place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

271-4.12

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
